entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT Library] Exceptions thrown from `[UnmanagedFunctionPointer]` delegate can't be caught in `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` method #97952
  • Invalid codegen for custom IL with ldtoken #97949
  • Instrument<T>.RecordMeasurement does not record if given empty TagList on .NET Framework #97948
  • Hashset.TrimExcess(int capacity) corrupts hashset data structure #97947
  • Marking a BlockingCollection with CompleteAdding() later causes System.OperationCanceledException to be thrown #97946
  • 'System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateValidIdentifier(string)` fails on potential identifiers that begin with a number (C#) #97945
  • NegotiateStream with ProtectionLevel.Sign failed in .NET 8 #97942
  • DefaultMeterFactory does not pass MeterOptions future properties to Meter constructor #97941
  • [API Proposal]: Consider support for `IEquatable<Uri>` on `System.Uri` #97940
  • Uri.TryCreate (and ctor) behave weird when using the IPv6 format #97939
  • Remove System.Text.Json & System.Diagnostic.DiagnositicSource as a dependency for newer TFM when it is provided by Framework #97938
  • [Feature Request]: Only include packages when not provided by the framework #97937
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration #97936

Closed

  • Performance regression with System.Numerics.Vector when retargeting from .NET 7 to .NET 8 #94920

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Place vtable slots deemed final by analysis into sealed vtable #97951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_FD_3A, IF_SVE_FD_3B, IF_SVE_FD_3C #97934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_F{A,B,C}_3{A,B} #97933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Merged

  • Don't use VN when it's already stale #97943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to fold basic arithmetic operations as part of import #97901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Save R9 (REG_SAVED_LOCALLOC_SP) in PInvoke frames #97919
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • IL test entry points should be in types so test discovery can occur. #97904
    test-bug, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Fix building on ARMhf userland on top of AARCH64 kernel #97929
    arch-arm32, os-linux, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • Issue 96277: Order by memory footprint #97277
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] SIMD cleanups #97918
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ubuntu: `sudo apt install dotnet8` failed but success with 6 & 7. #38527

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With VS 17.6 preview 1 + NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, Maui template is missing. #30576

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • C# needs some way to transition between generic type restrictions without boxing or reflection #7909

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608

PullRequests

Updated

  • Collection expressions: inline collections in spreads and foreach #7864
  • Update absolute links to relative #7900

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Struct constructor with only optional parameters not used #71954
  • Produce type/member level source link information in docs xml #71953
  • Analyzers should only include libraries not provided by the framework #71952

Closed

  • C# Collection Expression for arrays can't be outlined / folded in text editor #71932
    Backlog
  • If pattern match is not correct when cast without if ` bool casted = s is string s1;` #71955

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement code folding for collection expression #71951
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify serialization code #71944
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update absolute links to relative #71925
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get string property name in Display Template view ( Html.Display("Property1") ) #53810
  • Blazor webassembly project Program.cs cannot be debugged #53809
  • Dependency Injection is not working in Blazor Webassembly Layout Page #53808
  • Perf regression: json #53807
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #53806
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, plaintext #53805
  • Blazer Web App Scoped Service Instantiated Twice (pre-rendering disabled) #53804
  • NavigationException when attempting to navigate after submitting a form #53802
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53801

PullRequests

Updated

  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53792
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • An issue with query filtering and aggregation, after upgrading from 6.0.0 to 6.0.16 #33001

Closed

  • `Unable to determine the relationship represented by navigation` on cyclic one-to-many relationships #33002
  • Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #32984
    9.0.0-preview2

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #32984 - Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #33000
